author: James Joyce
text: Dear Sir I have just arrived here and beg you to let me know by return what news there is about my books. Any letters forwarded to me after Italian declaration of war did not reach me. If any letters are at my publisherâ€™s perhaps you could forward them, also. I shall probably remain in Switzerland till it is possible for me to return to Trieste. A letter to above address will find me in any case. I hope that now that we are in direct communication it will be possible to conclude something. Sincerely yours James Joyce
